Cheetor:




Cheetor walked along the forest, thinking. What was he going to do? There 
was no one here, but the bots that were off-line. Poor Depth Charge and 
TigerHawk. He just wished one of them were still alive. Quickstrike, Inferno 
and Waspinator were left for dead, what he heard. They were put off-line on 
the solid earth. He thought of going to find them, and just try to mess 
around. Just for the fun of it. There may be a possible way to put them back 
on-line. Just their heads maybe. It was funny to him if he could start a 
trantriliqist (spelling's wrong) act. Quickstrike he'd just kick around, 
because he hated that scum of a Predacon. He was all noise and huff, while 
the litle thing wound up getting slagged. Waspinator he would rig up and 
talk to.

He laughed, just thinking about it. He turned into a trot, going further 
into the forest, to where he wasn't sure where it lead to. He was the last 
Maximal, so he went anywhere he wanted to.

Suddenly, the youth saw some bright colors. He halted and crouched low. He 
was curious---and there was a familiar smell. A bad one. He crept up closer, 
then saw the colors blend into a familiar, odd frame. Quickstrike's frame! 
Holy lasers of Cybertron, the Fuzor was alive! He snaked his head around 
trying to get a better look. He was talking to another bot, but he couldn't 
see who it was.

He stayed low and kept himself close to the brush.

"Ultra bad," he whispered.
